STATE v. STURDIVANT. No. COA05-1194. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed July 5, 2006. Certification Date July 25, 2006. Appeal from Union (03CRS51227, 03CRS51228, 03CRS51229, 03CRS51230, 03CRS51231, 03CRS51232, 03CRS51233, 03CRS51234, 03CRS51235, 03CRS51236, 03CRS51237).

Case without published opinion. No error.
